nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的副职负责人，是国务院常务会议重要组成人员，职务为国家级副职公务员，位列党和国家领导人。
description.en: The deputy head of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, an important member of the Standing Committee of the State Council, a national deputy-level civil servant, and ranked among the Party and state leaders.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央人民政府。
description.en: The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as a Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as a Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as a Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as a Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的会议制度之一。
description.en: One of the meeting systems of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的会议制度之一，由总理、副总理、国务委员、秘书长组成。
description.en: One of the meeting systems of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, composed of the Premier, Vice Premiers, State Councilors, and Secretary-General.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院总理

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院总理

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院（中央人民政府）的最高领导人。
description.en: The head of the State Council (Central People's Government) of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公务员的领导职务级别之一，位列党和国家领导人。
description.en: One of the leadership position levels for civil servants in the People's Republic of China, ranked among the Party and state leaders.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治术语，是对在中国共产党和中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军、中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会担任领导职务的要员的统称。
description.en: A political term in the People's Republic of China, a collective term for key officials holding leadership positions in the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市西城区，是中华人民共和国国务院、中共中央书记处和中共中央办公厅等重要机关办公所在地。
description.en: Located in Xicheng District, Beijing, China, it is the office location for important organs such as the State Council of the People's Republic of China, the Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee, and the General Office of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家元首。
description.en: The head of state of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state organ of power in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的“中央人民政府”的组成部分，是国家政务的最高执行机关，为中华人民共和国国务院的前身。
description.en: Part of the "Central People's Government" in the early days of the People's Republic of China, serving as the highest executive organ for state affairs and the predecessor of the State Council of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央人民政府政务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as a Vice Premier of the Government Administration Council of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央人民政府政务院副总理及多届国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as a Vice Premier of the Government Administration Council and multiple terms as Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、学者，曾任中央人民政府政务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician and scholar, served as a Vice Premier of the Government Administration Council of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、教育家，曾任中央人民政府政务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician and educator, served as a Vice Premier of the Government Administration Council of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的组成人员之一，是国家级副职领导人。
description.en: A member of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, a national deputy-level leader.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构之一。
description.en: One of the central leading bodies of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局的常设机构，是中国共产党和中华人民共和国的最高领导层。
description.en: The standing committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, and the top leadership of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央人民政府政务院副总理及多届国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as a Vice Premier of the Government Administration Council and multiple terms as Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、军事家，曾任国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician and military strategist, served as a Vice Premier of the State Council.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 国务院副总理是国务院的副职负责人。
description.en: The Vice Premier is the deputy head of the State Council.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院总理

description.zh-cn: 国务院副总理在总理负责制下协助总理工作。
description.en: The Vice Premier assists the Premier under the Premier's responsibility system.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理
relationships.target: 国务院全体会议

description.zh-cn: 作为国务院组成人员，国务院副总理是国务院全体会议的成员。
description.en: As a member of the State Council, the Vice Premier is a member of the Plenary Meeting of the State Council.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理
relationships.target: 国务院常务会议

description.zh-cn: 国务院副总理是国务院常务会议的重要组成人员。
description.en: The Vice Premier is an important member of the Executive Meeting of the State Council.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理
relationships.target: 国家级副职

description.zh-cn: 国务院副总理的职务为国家级副职。
description.en: The post of Vice Premier is at the national deputy level.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理
relationships.target: 党和国家领导人

description.zh-cn: 国务院副总理位列党和国家领导人。
description.en: The Vice Premier is ranked among the Party and state leaders.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院总理
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理

description.zh-cn: 国务院副总理的人选由国务院总理提名。
description.en: Candidates for Vice Premier are nominated by the Premier of the State Council.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理

description.zh-cn: 国务院副总理的人选需经全国人民代表大会表决通过。
description.en: Candidates for Vice Premier must be approved by a vote of the National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理

description.zh-cn: 国家主席根据全国人民代表大会的决定任命国务院副总理。
description.en: The President of the PRC appoints the Vice Premier based on the decision of the National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中央人民政府政务院是中华人民共和国国务院的前身。
description.en: The Government Administration Council of the Central People's Government was the predecessor of the State Council of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 任第一届、第二届、第三届、第五届国务院副总理。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier in the 1st, 2nd, 3rd, and 5th State Councils.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 任第一届、第二届、第三届国务院副总理，任内死亡。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier in the 1st, 2nd, and 3rd State Councils, died in office.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 任第一届、第二届国务院副总理。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier in the 1st and 2nd State Councils.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 任第一届、第二届、第三届、第四届、第五届国务院副总理，期间曾被打倒和复职。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier in the 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, and 5th State Councils, was purged and reinstated during his tenure.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 任第一届、第二届国务院副总理。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier in the 1st and 2nd State Councils.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 任第一届、第二届、第三届国务院副总理，后被打倒。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier in the 1st, 2nd, and 3rd State Councils, later purged.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 任第一届、第二届、第三届国务院副总理，任内逝世。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier in the 1st, 2nd, and 3rd State Councils, died in office.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 任第一届、第二届、第三届国务院副总理。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier in the 1st, 2nd, and 3rd State Councils.

description.zh-cn: 任第一届、第二届、第三届国务院副总理，任内逝世。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier in the 1st, 2nd, and 3rd State Councils, died in office.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 任第一至五届国务院副总理。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier in the 1st to 5th State Councils.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 任第一届（增补）、第二届、第三届国务院副总理。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier in the 1st (co-opted), 2nd, and 3rd State Councils.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 任第一届（增补）、第二届、第三届、第五届国务院副总理。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier in the 1st (co-opted), 2nd, 3rd, and 5th State Councils.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 任第二届、第三届国务院副总理。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier in the 2nd and 3rd State Councils.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 任第二届、第三届国务院副总理，后被打倒。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier in the 2nd and 3rd State Councils, later purged.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 任第二届、第三届国务院副总理，后被撤职。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier in the 2nd and 3rd State Councils, later removed from office.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 任第二届国务院副总理。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier in the 2nd State Council.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 任第三届国务院副总理，任内逝世。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier in the 3rd State Council, died in office.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 任第三届国务院副总理，后被打倒。
